input.sentences: the bus with rabbits was going
where there were also giant buildings .
output.sentences: The city has many tours you can take but one of the best is the rabbit bus tour.
The bus takes you through the town and stops at the best local markets.
You get some great views of the citys giant buildings on parts of the tour.
The tour ends at an area where you get to watch an amazing performance.
If the bus tour left you wanting more you can catch a ride on this ship for a tour from the water.
